verbs.description: In a [V: scorching] [ARG0: editorial piece] , The New York Times forcefully rebuked President Trump ’s controversial legal memo , in which he argues that he can not be compelled to testify before a grand jury , prosecuted or charged with obstructing evidence because , as the president , he is the law .
